```{r}
# Load libraries
library(tidyverse)

# Load mtcars dataset
data(mtcars)

# Basic summary of the dataset
summary(mtcars)

# Improved scatter plot with color and size aesthetics
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = hp, y = mpg, color = factor(cyl), size = wt)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Miles Per Gallon vs Horsepower",
       x = "Horsepower",
       y = "Miles Per Gallon",
       color = "Cylinders",
       size = "Weight")


# Linear model predicting mpg based on hp
model <- lm(mpg ~ hp, data = mtcars)
summary(model)

```
